snippet: Marilynne Robinson won the National Book Critics Circle Award for her novel “Lila,” the final book in her trilogy set in the fictional Gilead, Iowa.
abstract: Marilynne Robinson wins National Book Critics Circle Award for her novel Lila, final book in Gilead trilogy; Robinson's award is presented along with six others at ceremony at New york City's New School.
lead_paragraph: Marilynne Robinson won the National Book Critics Circle Award for her novel “Lila,” the final book in her trilogy set in the fictional Gilead, Iowa.

headline.main: ‘Lila’ Honored as Top Fiction by National Book Critics Circle
headline.print_headline: ‘Lila’ Honored as Top Fiction by National Book Critics Circle
